Class DoubleCannon

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.ComponentTiles.ComponentTile
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.ComponentTiles.Cannon
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.ComponentTiles.DoubleCannon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DoubleCannon extends Cannon
The DoubleCannon class represents a specific type of cannon that extends the functionality of the Cannon base class. The DoubleCannon can have an active double-barrel cannon on one of its sides, while the other parts of the cannon may vary in configuration.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • DoubleCannon

      public DoubleCannon(String pngName, Side topSide, Side bottomSide, Side leftSide, Side rightSide)
      Constructs a DoubleCannon object, representing a specialized cannon with double-barrel functionality on one or more sides. The DoubleCannon extends the Cannon base class, enabling additional behavior and properties.
      Parameters:
      pngName - the name of the image file representing this component visually
      topSide - the type of the top side of the cannon
      bottomSide - the type of the bottom side of the cannon
      leftSide - the type of the left side of the cannon
      rightSide - the type of the right side of the cannon

  • Method Details

    • getCannonStrength

      public double getCannonStrength()
      Calculates the strength of the cannon based on its active sides. If the top side is active, the strength of the cannon will be 2. If any of the left, right, or bottom sides are active (but not the top), the strength of the cannon will be 1. If no sides are active, the strength of the cannon will be 0.
      Overrides:
      getCannonStrength in class Cannon
      Returns:
      the strength of the cannon as a double value determined by the active sides: 2 if the top side is active, 1 if any of the other sides are active, and 0 if no side is active.

    • activateComponent

      public void activateComponent()
      Activates the components for each side of the DoubleCannon. This method sets the active state of the top, bottom, left, and right sides based on their respective cannon configurations. If a side has a cannon assigned to it, the corresponding active flag for that side will be set to true, enabling functionality for that side. Otherwise, the active flag will remain false.
      Overrides:
      activateComponent in class ComponentTile

    • deactivateComponent

      public void deactivateComponent()
      Deactivates all sides of the DoubleCannon component. This method sets all active status fields (top, bottom, left, and right sides) of the DoubleCannon to false, effectively disabling any operational functionality associated with the component.
      Overrides:
      deactivateComponent in class ComponentTile

    • isDoubleCannon

      public boolean isDoubleCannon()
      Determines if the current component is a DoubleCannon.
      Overrides:
      isDoubleCannon in class ComponentTile
      Returns:
      true, indicating that the component is a DoubleCannon.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the DoubleCannon object, including its active status and configuration of its top, bottom, left, and right sides. The representation specifies which side contains the double cannon barrel and its current activation status, while displaying the configuration of other sides.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Cannon
      Returns:
      a string describing the current state and configuration of the DoubleCannon object

    • getDrawableTUI

      public DrawableComponentTileTUI getDrawableTUI()
      Creates and returns a drawable text-based UI (TUI) component that visually represents the current state and configuration of the `DoubleCannon` object. The returned `DrawableComponentTileTUI` uses symbols to depict the four sides and activation status of the `DoubleCannon` for textual visualization.
      Overrides:
      getDrawableTUI in class Cannon
      Returns:
      a `DrawableDoubleCannonTUI` instance representing the visual representation of the `DoubleCannon` component in text-based UI format.

    • getDrawable

      public DrawableComponentTile getDrawable()
      Retrieves a drawable representation of the double cannon.
      Overrides:
      getDrawable in class Cannon
      Returns:
      a DrawableComponentTile instance representing the drawable version of the double cannon, specifically a DrawableDoubleCannon.

    • isActivated

      public boolean isActivated()
      Determines if the double cannon is currently activated on any of its sides.
      Overrides:
      isActivated in class ComponentTile
      Returns:
      true if any of the sides (top, bottom, left, or right) of the double cannon is active; false otherwise.
